Implement Phase 3: Task Item Styling

GOAL:  Create CSS for task items including checkbox, text, and delete button with all visual states.

TASKS:
- Create task item container styles with flex layout
- Style custom checkbox (unchecked and checked states)
- Style task text area
- Style delete button with hover states
- Style completed task state

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA:
- Task item has background #ffffff, border 1px solid #e0e0e0, border-radius 6px
- Task item has padding: 12px 16px, display flex, align-items center
- Task item gap between elements is 12px
- Space between task items is 8px
- Checkbox is 20px × 20px, border 2px solid #e0e0e0, border-radius 4px, cursor pointer
- Checkbox when checked: background #16a34a, border-color #16a34a, displays white checkmark
- Task text has font-size 16px, font-weight 400, color #1a1a1a, flex: 1
- Delete button: background transparent, color #666666, border none, padding 8px, border-radius 4px, cursor pointer
